medical_history.chief_complaint: Generalized abdominal pain with sharp pain in the left lower quadrant radiating to the right side and flanks.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began recently and have persisted, described as constant sharp pain. The patient has been unable to eat due to the pain, has experienced emesis four times with bilious appearance, and has had five loose stools without distinct flatus for several days.
